name: Modern Strike - Monster FPS Shooter
description:
Modern Strike aka FPS Survival Monsters Game is an innovative FREE zombie shooter 3D game with only one purpose: KILL THEM ALL! Monsters keep spawning there is no escaping them except survive. You have 1 weapon + infinite ammo, all it takes is just one shot to kill one monster. There are monsters coming to attack you with nobody in your team.

This game features high and realistic graphics and is fun and easy to play! You are left to survive in a arena full of mad monsters. In order to fend off an army of monsters you have to become a high-skilled monster hunter! Can you survive the monsters and become a high skilled monster hunter?

This game can be played in Windows 10 or above, Mac and Linux. I recommend you to download and play it on your computer for ultra fps and performance. Also note that this is a PC game and you will have to extract the files once the game is downloaded into a folder and then enjoy the game!

Join our discord to discuss any bugs or glitches you want to let me know and chat with this games community
